info.title: Automatic Paint
info.detail: Automatically paint a given well formed SVG file.

status.initial: Click to start painting your picture!
status.park: Move the carriage back to the home position
status.confirm: Are you sure you want to cancel the current print job and reset (for example, to start a new print job)?
status.ready: Click to start painting your picture!
status.cancelled: Canvas reset, spooling and printing cancelled.
